Texts.Eng:
Resilient, cold-dwelling omnivorous creatures with a mysterious origin rooted in the distant past.

^orange;Diet^reset;: Omnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Health x^green;1.15^reset;, Energy x^green;1.12^reset;, Damage x^green;1.05^reset;
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^cyan;30^reset;% Ice, +^cyan;5^reset;% Radioactive, Fall Damage x^cyan;0.8^reset; 
  +^green;5^reset;% Jump Height
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Liquid Nitrogen, Cold, Ice
  +^green;75^reset; Max Food

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  In ^green;cold^reset; biomes: Health & Energy x^green;1.15^reset;
  In ^red;hot^reset; biomes: Health & Energy x^green;1.20^reset;

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  All Guns: Damage x^green;1.1^reset;, +^green;5^reset;% Crit Damage
  Axe Mastery: +^green;15^reset;%
  Machine Pistol Mastery: +^green;15^reset;%

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;30^reset;% Fire, -^red;10^reset;% Radiation
